sentences.en: A gunman fired off a volley of shots into the air.
sentences.cn: 持枪歹徒朝天扫射了一排子弹。

sentences.en: A man fired a volley of shots at them.
sentences.cn: 一名男子向他们射出了一排子弹。

sentences.en: A volley of automatic rifle fire could be heard.
sentences.cn: 一阵自动步枪的扫射声传了过来.

sentences.en: A volley of bullets ripped into the facing wall.
sentences.cn: 一排子弹射进对面的墙上。

sentences.en: A volley of shots rang out!
sentences.cn: 就在她们的耳边响起一排枪!

sentences.en: He heard the thunder of the volley.
sentences.cn: 他听见了一阵排枪的射击声.

sentences.en: He responded to my volley with a backhand, ie in tennis.
sentences.cn: 他反手一击把我截击的空中球打了回来(网球中).

sentences.en: He volleyed the ball spectacularly into the far corner of the net.
sentences.cn: 他一个精彩的凌空抽射，将球踢进了球网的远角。

sentences.en: Her volley was quite impossible to return.
sentences.cn: 她的拦击简直无法回击.

sentences.en: Our militia fired off volley after volley from antiaircraft artillery.
sentences.cn: 我民兵的高射炮连续射击.

sentences.en: She hit a forehand volley into the net.
She hit a forehand volley into the net.
The angry man let fly a volley of oaths.
sentences.cn: 那个愤怒的人发出一连串的咒语.

sentences.en: The angry passenger directed a volley of curses at the driver.
sentences.cn: 那愤怒的乘客对司机发出了一连串的咒骂.

sentences.en: The light of a brilliant American day streamed down into the volley.
sentences.cn: 美洲大陆又开始了新的一天,灿烂的阳光洒向湖谷.

sentences.en: Three mounted officers rode into the field after the volley.
sentences.cn: 枪炮一起开火后，3名军官骑着马冲进战场。

words.tran_cn: [军]齐射；齐射出的子弹；凌空状态

trans.tran_cn: （箭、子弹、枪、炮、等）群射，齐射，（质问，咒骂等的）迸发
trans.tran_en: a large number of bullets, rocks etc shot or thrown through the air at the same time

trans.tran_cn: 齐发， 群射； 截击
trans.tran_en: to hit or kick a ball before it touches the ground, especially in tennis or football
